headline: Mudiay managed 18 points (5-9 FG, 2-4 3Pt, 6-6 FT), five rebounds, three assists, and two steals across 31 minutes during the Nuggets' 121-101 loss versus the Celtics on Sunday.

Nelson could require surgery on his sprained left wrist, Chris Dempsey of the Denver Post reports. "I [recently] saw my doctor in Philadelphia, which we all thought was best," Nelson said. "And I got another MRI and it showed some stuff."
